msContents.summary: Unrelated fragments(18)(B) grid in red ink with numerals in it

physDesc.p: Fragments 1-19 (in mm), (1) 43 x 40, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (2) 31 x 19, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 30 x 17, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (4) 33 x 21, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 34 x 23, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 50 x 12, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 40 x 11, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 44 x 29, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, top margin, (9) 46 x 33, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (10) 30 x 23, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (11) 30 x 48, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) red ink traces, (12) 25 x 20, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) Demotic (?), (13) 27 x 23, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 39 x 18, (A) 2 lines, top margins, (B) blank, (15) 50 x 62, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (16) 76 x 28, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (17) 61 x 43, (A) 5 lines, right bottom margins, (B) blank, (18) 56 x 26, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, bottom margin, (19) 49 x 26, (A) 6 lines, top (?) margin, (B) blank
